title: weird issue happened to me !!! Found it on RDT too
body:
i fixed my internet and contacted my ISP after a long time of suffering i was able to fix the problems but ..... 
i have 100 ping normally wich is fine.
but sometimes when i go to game it is changed to 150 if i join a game after that sometimes it stays the same and sometimes it changes back to 100 no pattern .. can you help me ?? what might be causing this i searched this problem and i found many cases like mine on reddit. 
HELP !{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey Zakriashishani, 

Really hard to enjoy a game when your client is consistently lagging on you! Thankfully I have a couple things that may help. When a client starts to lag it's usually due to the client having a hard time connecting to our server. Let's have you start off by running through these[ Connection Steps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you that's not the issue. If it continues after that I would also try putting the client into low spec mode by going into setting, clicking on general settings, and clicking "Enable Low Spec Mode." 

If you continue to have lag issues after that make sure to let me know, i'lle Pik-eeing around corners. 
{{champion:25}}
My low spec mode is enabled and i have done all these tips already.
